did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Petersburg (Va.) Cooke v. Hannon Judgment, November 1841

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Petersburg (Va.) Cooke v. Hannon Judgment, November 1841. Local government records collection, Petersburg Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia under the accession number 39178.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: The City of Petersburg was established in 1748. It was incorporated as a town in 1784 and incorporated as a city in 1850. Parts of Prince George and Dinwiddie Counties were added in 1972.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Petersburg (Va.) Cooke v. Hannon Judgment, November 1841. Consists of an assumpsit and a summons from the debt case, John B. Cooke vs. Richard F. Hannon.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Petersburg Court Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. See www.lva.lib.va.us/whatwehave/local/local_rec/index.htm
